question: Which among the following app was launched by the Uttar Pradesh government to provide health-related information about ayurvedic medicines to combat COVID-19?
explanation: The name of the app which was launched by the Uttar Pradesh government to provide health-related information about ayurvedic medicines to combat COVID-19 is Ayush Kavach-Covid app. The app contains methods of immunity-boosting and health benefit of commonly available items like Tulsi, Cinnamon etc.
